name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos: Yugi the Destiny
description: Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos: Yugi the Destiny is the first Yu-Gi-Oh! game for PC and the first of the three Power of Chaos games. This first game includes 155 cards, most of which are from Legend of Blue Eyes White Dragon and Starter Deck: Yugi, two are from Metal Raiders, one is from Spell Ruler, another is from Tournament Pack: 3rd Season and the other is from Starter Deck: Pegasus.

name: YUGIOH! THE LEGEND REBORN V2
description: YuGiOh! THE LEGEND REBORN – Power of Chaos MOD. This game has 1109 cards in total (over 400 are added by me) including some anime-only cards (like The Seal of Orichalcos, 3 Legendary Dragons, 3 Legendary Knights, Fossil Fusion Monsters, Orgoth the Relentless, Blue Flame Swordsman, Dragonroid, Giant Rex…) and fan-made cards (like Dark Magician Girl of Chaos, Breaker the Magician Girl, Blue-Eyes Baby Dragon…)

name: YuGiOh! A Duel of Friendship – Power of Chaos
description: This game has 1109 cards in total (over 400 are added by me) including some anime-only cards (like The Seal of Orichalcos, 3 Legendary Dragons, 3 Legendary Knights, Fossil Fusion Monsters, Orgoth the Relentless, Blue Flame Swordsman, Dragonroid, Giant Rex…) and fan-made cards (like Dark Magician Girl of Chaos, Breaker the Magician Girl, Blue-Eyes Baby Dragon…).

name: YUGI0H! POWER OF CHAOS – JOEY’S WORLD
description: This game has 1109 cards in total (over 400 are added by me) including some anime-only cards (like The Seal of Orichalcos, 3 Legendary Dragons, 3 Legendary Knights, Fossil Fusion Monsters, Orgoth the Relentless, Blue Flame Swordsman, Dragonroid, Giant Rex…) and fan-made cards (like Dark Magician Girl of Chaos, Breaker the Magician Girl, Blue-Eyes Baby Dragon…).
